double GetBatteryStatus ( DWORD  BioRadio150 )

Get current voltage (in Volts) of User Unit's battery supply.

Parameters:
BioRadio150object handle
Returns:
battery status, or no device object at handle (-1)
int GetBioRadioModelString ( DWORD  BioRadio150,
char *  BioRadioModelString,
int  StrLength 
)

Get a string indicating the model of the BioRadio in use. Communication should have been started at some point during the session.

Parameters:
BioRadio150object handle
BioRadioModelStringan array to be filled with the model as a null-terminated C-string
StrLengthcardinality of the char array provided. (50 suggested)
Returns:
success (1) or failure (-1)
int GetDeviceID ( DWORD  BioRadio150,
WORD *  DeviceID 
)

Get the device's 2-byte (2-ASCII-character) identifier. Communication must be started.

Parameters:
BioRadio150object handle
DeviceIDaddress of WORD in which to store acquired Device ID
Returns:
success (1), failure to get Device ID (0), or no device object at handle (-1)
int GetDeviceIDString ( DWORD  BioRadio150,
char *  DeviceIDCStr,
int  StrLength 
)

Get the device's 2-byte (2-ASCII-character) identifier as a null-terminated C-String. Communication must be started.

Parameters:
BioRadio150object handle
DeviceIDCStra C-String (char array) of length >=3 to be filled with the null-terminated Device ID
StrLengthcardinality of the char array provided. (3 suggested)
Returns:
success (1), StrLength insufficient (0), or no device object at handle (-1)
void GetDLLVersionString ( char *  VersionString,
int  StrLength 
)

Get a string indicating the version number of this DLL.

Parameters:
VersionStringan array to be filled with the version as a null-terminated C-string
StrLengthcardinality of the array provided. (20 suggested)
Returns:
success (1) or failure (not 1)
int GetFirmwareVersionString ( DWORD  BioRadio150,
char *  VersionString,
int  StrLength 
)

Get a string indicating the version of Computer Unit's installed firmware. In the form, MajorVersion.MinorVersion, where each is an integer. Communication must be started.

Parameters:
BioRadio150object handle
VersionStringan array to be filled with the version as a null-terminated C-string
StrLengthcardinality of the array provided. (10 suggested)
Returns:
success (1) or failure (-1)
long GetMode ( DWORD  BioRadio150,
WORD &  Mode 
)

Query the Computer Unit's current mode setting. (Debug only.)

Parameters:
BioRadio150object handle
Modeaddress of WORD in which to store current mode indicator
Returns:
success (1), failed to get mode (0), or no device object at handle (-1)
